chain_history.reasoning: The user wants to move the current channel from one TV to another and turn off the first TV. The command indicates that the first TV is currently on, and the second TV is off. I need to confirm the channel currently being watched and the specific TVs involved to execute this command correctly.

The user wants to move the channel from the currently active TV (Samsung 8 Series) to the inactive TV (Samsung The Frame) and turn off the first TV. I need to confirm the channel currently being watched on the first TV and ensure the second TV is ready to receive the channel.

The user wants to move the channel currently being watched on the Samsung 8 Series TV to the Samsung The Frame TV, which is off. I need to confirm the channel on the first TV and ensure the second TV can receive it before turning off the first TV.
